author: Nicolás Sturtz
title: La INSÓLITA FRASE de la ministra de Deportes de Francia tras el ESCÁNDALO de Argentina vs Marruecos | Radio Mitre
text: Tras el escándalo de Argentina vs Marruecos por el primer partido de fútbol masculino en los [ Juegos Olímpicos,](https://radiomitre.cienradios.com/deportes/los-hinchas-franceses-volvieron-a-abuchear-el-himno-de-argentina-en-los-juegos-olimpicos-y-sigue-la-polemica/) la ministra de Deportes de Francia, Amélie Oudéa-Castéra habló sobre lo sucedido pero de una forma insólita. La FIFA abrió una investigación tras el escándalo entre Argentina y Marruecos en los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024 La insólita frase de la ministra de Deportes de Francia tras el escándalo de Argentina vs Marruecos Después de la suspensión del encuentro por la invasión de los hinchas marroquíes y el reinicio del juego tras casi dos horas, la funcionaria dio su mirada sobre el bochornoso momento y aseguró que fue una “intrusión bastante bondadosa”. En declaraciones para la televisión francesa, la ministra de Deportes detalló: “En este partido de Saint-Etienne entre Marruecos y Argentina, hubo un pequeño momento de confusión, no quiero negarlo, pero estuvo ligado a una dificultad del arbitraje”. La AFA pedirá los puntos tras el escandaloso partido ante Marruecos en los Juegos Olímpicos y se amparan en un bochornoso antecedente del fútbol argentino Luego, agregó: “Fue una pequeña intrusión que no debió suceder, pero que era bastante bondadosa de la parte de los fanáticos marroquíes”, y sumó: “Hubo un largo tiempo de detención en el que hubo un poco de tergiversación en el plano de arbitraje”. Con respecto a los problemas de organización de los Juegos Olímpicos, Amélie Oudéa-Castéra cerró: “Un análisis fue hecho entre el comité de organización y la FIFA. Todo va a estar en orden. Habrá un próximo partido entre Ucrania y Marruecos el sábado próximo en Saint-Etienne. Todo será absolutamente genial”. El duro comunicado de Chiqui Tapia tras el escándalo en Argentina vs Marruecos en los Juegos Olímpicos: “Va contra las reglas” La AFA pedirá los puntos tras el escandaloso partido ante Marruecos en los Juegos Olímpicos y se amparan en un bochornoso antecedente del fútbol argentino En un duro comunicado tras la polémica, el presidente de la Asociación del Fútbol Argentino informó que elevaron un reclamo formal a la Comisión Disciplinaria de la FIFA “para que se tomen las medidas reglamentarias pertinentes y se imponga una sanción a quien o quienes corresponda”. La justificación del reclamo es, resumidamente, que el partido no debía reanudarse. Si eso sucedía, el agónico gol de Medina no podía ser anulado y el seleccionado nacional rescataba un punto en la última jugada del encuentro.

text:
Surgical Visualization Products Market Insights 2025-2034: Growth Forecast and Strategic Priorities 07-31-2025 06:44 AM CET | Health & Medicine
Press release from: The Business Research Company Surgical Visualization Products Market

Surgical Visualization Products Market Size Valuation Forecast: What Will the Market Be Worth by 2025?
The market size for surgical visualization products has seen considerable growth in recent years. Projected to expand from $2.65 billion in 2024 to $2.99 billion in 2025, it's expected to boast a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 12.6%. The historical growth surge can be linked to factors like the rise in minimally invasive surgeries, a move towards outpatient surgeries, the requirement for improved educational resources, patient preferences for more advanced procedures, and strong support and funding from the government.
Surgical Visualization Products Market Size Forecast: What's the Projected Valuation by 2029?
The market for surgical visualization products is anticipated to experience rapid expansion in the coming years, expected to reach $4.48 billion in 2029, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.7%. The projected growth in this interval can be associated with worldwide surgical training efforts, the rise in the elderly population, a focus on patient safety and outcomes, global healthcare preparedness, and an emphasis on value-oriented healthcare. Key trends during this forecast period include the uptake of 4K and 3D visualization, wireless and portable visualization systems, robot-enhanced surgical visualization, AI-driven image evaluation, and improved connectivity and data merging.
View the full report here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/report/surgical-visualization-products-global-market-report
What Are the Drivers Transforming the Surgical Visualization Products Market?
The surge in surgical procedures is anticipated to fuel the expansion of the surgical visualization products market in the future. Surgical visualization products, used in the medical field that employs manual or instrumental methodologies for diagnosing and treating different health problems, injuries, or diseases, are significant in modern operational methods. They equip surgeons and medical staff with improved visual details and instruments, thereby enhancing surgical precision, safety, and results. For instance, as per the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery, a US-based organization for board-certified aesthetic plastic surgeons, an 11.2% total rise in procedures administered by plastic surgeons was recorded in 2022, having over 14.9 million surgical procedures executed globally. In the past four years, there's been a consistent growth in cosmetic surgery, exhibiting a 41.3% surge. Hence, the escalating number of surgeries is poised to boost the surgical visualization products market's growth. Market Driver for Surgical Visualization Products: The Transformation of Healthcare with Endoscopic Procedures Optimizing Surgical Visualization Market

What Long-Term Trends Will Define the Future of the Surgical Visualization Products Market?
Key players in the surgical visualization products industry are capitalizing on innovation and new technology developments, such as the VISERA ELITE III Surgical Visualization Platform, to secure a competitive lead in the market. The VISERA ELITE III is a cutting-edge development that amalgamates multiple viewing modes with fluorescence-guided procedures in 4K to amplify the success rates of surgeries. For example, in September 2022, the Olympus Corporation, a manufacturer of optics and reprography items based in Japan, rolled out the VISERA ELITE III Surgical Visualization Platform. This product offers a variety of observation alternatives, ensuring a comprehensive perspective of the surgical surroundings. It contributes to more successful surgeries, anticipates the future of endoscopic procedures, advances minimally invasive treatments, and accelerates the learning process of procedures. Future software updates are expected to refine the technology used in surgical imaging, thereby allowing for personalization to meet the diverse needs of different surgical procedures, and consequently reducing cost requirements.

author: Republished By Plato
title: Finextra’s top research reports of 2023
text:
With 2023 drawing to a close, we take a look back at our most downloaded whitepapers, sentiment papers and surveys over the course of the past year. These reports are Finextra-led and cobranded, based on editorially balanced, independent, referenced desk-based and online research.
Top research reports of 2023
5. From Cloud to Multicloud, Pathway to Resilience
This industry survey, conducted by Finextra in association with Form3, which was designed to glean the general attitude and approach multi-cloud infrastructure, perceived benefits and perceived challenges around implementation. Notably, it sought to establish the general awareness of various new and incoming regulations around resilience and systemic risk, of how cloud and cloud providers can navigate this and how much, if any, business opportunity firms see in resilience and risk compliance.
4. Can FIs lead the World’s ESG charge with Pioneering and Transparent Data Visualisation?
This Finextra report takes a view on the rapidly unfolding story of ESG within banking and financial services at large. Regulation is being dramatically reshaped such that financial organisations become increasingly obligated to make consciously ethical investment decisions, becoming responsible for non-compliant ESG parties in their own value chains. However, different rules and formats apply in different countries, which causes significant compliance challenges.
3. Customer Experience – Is Hyperpersonalisation the next frontier?
This Finextra survey, produced in association with SoftServe and conducted in late 2022/early 2023, aimed to quantify priorities and ambitions in financial services with regard to improving the digital experience of services for the customer, and to what extent services have or will become personalised, or even hyperpersonalised. The findings show a genuine and growing appetite by banks and other financial service providers to invest more in making customers’ online engagements easier and more fulfilling.
2. Embracing Technology to shape the Future of Digital Banking
This whitepaper, produced in association with Worldline, explores the current landscape of models and what factors may influence further evolution. There has been a tidal wave of transformation – the pace of it is accelerating, technology is proliferating, and customer behaviour and expectation are advancing all the time; the banking industry is in flux and it is a challenging time but also an exciting one.
1. Payments Modernisation: The Big Survey 2023
This Finextra survey, produced in association with Volante Technologies, builds on the previous 2021 and 2022 industry surveys. The latest 2023 edition captures and examines ongoing priorities within payments modernisation, with a particular focus on the growth or need for partnerships and cloud-facilitated account-to-account (A2A) payment applications and payments-as-a-service (PaaS) offerings. The report analysis will provide a comprehensive overview of the status and adoption of real-time payment networks within domestic markets and increasingly through intra-regional schemes and cross-border networks globally.

author: Click4r Solutions Private Limited
title: Revealing The Benefits Of Regular Ceramic Tile And Cement Upkeep | Click4R
text: Revealing The Benefits Of Regular Ceramic Tile And Cement Upkeep Posted On: July 5, 2024, 10:24 am Article Created By-Vedel Haugaard Did you know that the ordinary family invests about 6 hours every week cleansing? That's a considerable quantity of time dedicated to keeping a clean and tidy living space. But while we typically focus on the visible surfaces, like kitchen counters and floorings, one location that is frequently forgotten is the ceramic tile and grout. Nonetheless, ignoring routine tile and grout cleaning can have some significant effects. In this discussion, we will certainly discover the advantages of normal ceramic tile and cement cleansing that go beyond simply appearance, and why it is necessary for the general wellness and longevity of your home. So, let's dive in and uncover the concealed advantages that wait for. Enhanced Longevity and Durability Regular tile and cement cleansing boosts the resilience and longevity of your floorings, ensuring they hold up against the test of time. By eliminating dirt, debris, and crud from the floor tiles and grout lines, you prevent the buildup of substances that can create damage over time. When left neglected, these particles can wear down the protective layer on the floor tiles, making them more prone to scratches and cracks. Furthermore, normal cleansing assists to stop the growth of mold and mold, which can compromise the cement and lead to discoloration and wear and tear. Enhanced Indoor Air Quality To enhance the air top quality inside, it is essential to frequently cleanse your ceramic tile and grout. In time, dirt, dust, allergens, and mold can collect in the permeable surface areas of your ceramic tile and grout. When left uncleaned, these fragments can become airborne and circulate airborne you take a breath, bring about bad indoor air quality. Normal tile and grout cleaning aids to get rid of these impurities, decreasing the danger of respiratory system problems and allergies. Furthermore, clean tile and grout avoid the development of mold and mildew and mold, which can additionally add to interior air pollution. Avoidance of Mold And Mildew and Mildew Growth How can you effectively stop the growth of mold and mildew on your floor tile and cement? Right here are four simple pointers to maintain your tiles and cement mold-free: 1. ** Routine cleaning **: Tidy your floor tiles and cement on a regular basis to eliminate dust, dirt, and wetness that can promote mold and mildew growth. Use a light cleaning agent and a soft brush or wipe to cleanse the surface extensively. 2. ** Appropriate ventilation **: Ensure excellent air circulation in your restroom or cooking area by opening up windows or using exhaust fans. This aids to decrease moisture degrees and prevent mold and mildew from prospering. 3. ** Seal your grout **: Apply a grout sealant to shield your grout lines from dampness absorption. This develops a barrier that stops mold and mold from resolving into the porous grout. 4. ** Quickly address leaks **: Deal with any leakages or water damage in your home promptly. https://twitter.com/procleanbath from leakages can leak right into your floor tiles and cement, giving a perfect breeding place for mold and mildew and mold. Final thought So, if you want to maintain your ceramic tiles looking fresh and your home healthy, regular ceramic tile and cement cleaning is a must. https://www.realsimple.com/home-organizing/cleaning/how-to-clean-water-stainsdoes it boost toughness and durability, however it likewise boosts interior air top quality by removing irritants and dust. And allow's not ignore the prevention of mold and mildew and mold development, which can create severe health concerns. Do not neglect your tiles; give them the care they should have and enjoy a cleaner, healthier home. Besides, prevention is constantly far better than remedy. author: Newsroom Infobae
title: Denuncian la detención del vicario general de la Arquidiócesis de Managua
text:
San José, 28 dic (EFE).- El sacerdote nicaragüense Carlos Áviles, vicario general de la Arquidiócesis de Managua, capital de Nicaragua, fue detenido este jueves por la Policía en medio de tensiones entre el Gobierno del presidente Daniel Ortega y la Iglesia católica, denunció la abogada e investigadora nicaragüense exiliada Martha Patricia Molina.
"El Ministerio del Interior amanece realizando su primera arbitrariedad. Han secuestrado a monseñor Carlos Avilés, vicario general de la Arquidiócesis de Managua, quien en años anteriores declaró que el presidente Daniel Ortega miente al decir que en Nicaragua hay libertad", denunció Molina, autora del estudio titulado 'Nicaragua: ¿Una Iglesia perseguida?', a través de su cuenta de la red social X (antes Twitter).
La opositora Unidad Nacional Azul y Blanco también denunció la detención del sacerdote de la Arquidiócesis de Managua, que dirige el cardenal nicaragüense, Leopoldo Brenes, quien aún no se refiere a esa denuncia.
"Otro zarpazo represivo de la dictadura contra la Iglesia católica. Su secuestro se suma al encarcelamiento del obispo Isidoro Mora, dos sacerdotes y dos seminaristas en los últimos días", indicó la Unidad Nacional en una declaración.
En el caso de Mora, obispo de la diócesis de Siuna, en el Caribe de Nicaragua, quien fue encarcelado junto a dos seminaristas, fue detenido el 20 de diciembre un día después de invocar en una homilía al obispo encarcelado Rolando Álvarez, condenado en febrero pasado a más de 26 años de prisión por delitos considerados traición a la patria tras negarse a abandonar su país.
Ni el Gobierno que preside Daniel Ortega ni la Policía Nacional ha confirmado o negado la presunta detención de otro sacerdote.
En el caso de Mora es el segundo obispo detenido en Nicaragua. El primero fue Álvarez, quien el 10 de febrero pasado fue condenado a 26 años y 4 meses de prisión, despojado de su nacionalidad, y suspendidos sus derechos ciudadanos de por vida por delitos considerados traición a la patria.
Esa condena fue dictada un día después de que Álvarez rechazó subirse a un avión que lo iba a llevar, junto con otros 222 excarcelados políticos nicaragüenses, hacia Estados Unidos, lo que provocó la indignación del presidente Ortega, quien en cadena nacional lo calificó de "soberbio", "desquiciado" y "energúmeno".
Las relaciones del Gobierno de Ortega y la Iglesia católica viven momentos de gran tensión, marcadas por la expulsión y encarcelamiento de sacerdotes, la prohibición de actividades religiosas, y la suspensión de sus relaciones diplomáticas.EFE
mg/rao/laa

author: Agencies
title: CES 2025: Not all innovation is good!
text: So much of the technology showcased at CES includes gadgets made to improve consumers, but not all innovation is good. A panel of self-described dystopia experts has judged some products as ‘Worst in Show. Least repairable product Kyle Wiens, CEO of iFixit, awarded the US$ 2,200 Ultrahuman Rare Luxury Smart Ring the title of least repairable. Its battery only lasts 500 charges and cant be replaced. Sharing too much Boschs ‘Revol crib uses sensors, cameras and AI that can help monitor how an infant is sleeping, heart and respiratory rates and more. The crib can also rock gently and signal if a blanket or other object is interfering with breathing. But EFF Executive Director Cindy Cohn said it collects excessive data about babies. Ultrahuman Rare Luxury Smart Ring Too much waste? Stacey Higginbotham, a policy Fellow at Consumer Reports, felt that SoundHound AIs In-Car Commerce Ecosystem increases energy consumption and distracts drivers. Vulnerable to hacks TP-Links Archer BE900 router won for least secure. Paul Roberts, founder of Security Ledger, said TP-Link showcased it without addressing issues. Who wanted this? Nathan Proctor, senior director of US PIRG, a consumer advocacy group, said Samsungs Bespoke AI Washing Machine is filled with features no one needs, making the appliance more expensive, fragile, and harder to repair. The worst overall Gay Gordon-Byrne, director of The Repair Association called the LG ‘AI Home Inside 2.0 Refrigerator with ThinkQ the worst product overall.
